document_data.caption: Column logo from [[Polyhedron 129|Polyhedron #129]].
document_data.title: The Everwinking Eye
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.style: "text-align: center;" |{{posup|148/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}

|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 54|Polyhedron #54]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster's Guide to the Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting 
| style="text-align: center;" |The creator of the Realms interviews [[Elminster]] about [[Maskyr's Eye]] in the first of a continuing series on the Realms.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|54/The Everwinking Eye: Elminster's Guide to the Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 55|Polyhedron #55]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye
| style="text-align: center;" |The creator of the Realms takes a close look at [[Maskyr's Eye]] and the people who live there.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 56|Polyhedron #56]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Adventures in Maskyr's Eye
| style="text-align: center;" |To the outsider, there isn't much to see in [[Maskyr's Eye]]. But the people are hardy souls who are worth meeting, and there is adventure to be found if you look in the right places.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|56/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 57|Polyhedron #57]]
| style="text-align: center;" |At Home in Maskyr's Eye
| style="text-align: center;" |Ed and Elminster finish their discussion of the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in the Forgotten Realms.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 58|Polyhedron #58]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Adventures in Maskyr's Eye
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster and Ed present ideas for adventures in [[The Vast]] and reveal a few topics for future discussions.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|58/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 60|Polyhedron #60]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Who's Who in Mulmaster
| style="text-align: center;" |The creator of the Realms is not finished with [[Mulmaster]]. This issue he takes a look at who's who in the city.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|60/The Everwinking Eye: Who's Who in Mulmaster}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 63|Polyhedron #63]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Who's Who in Mulmaster
| style="text-align: center;" |Learn about archpriests, lesser clergy, merchants, and accommodations in [[Mulmaster]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|63/The Everwinking Eye: Who's Who in Mulmaster}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 64|Polyhedron #64]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Daily Life in Mulmaster
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Mulmaster]] has a seedier side. Be careful your player characters don't get caught up in it.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 66|Polyhedron #66]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Adventures in Mulmaster
| style="text-align: center;" |Watch your back and count your friends! Adventures in [[Mulmaster]] await.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|66/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Mulmaster}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 67|Polyhedron #67]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Who's Who in Mulmaster, Part 2
| style="text-align: center;" |A bevy of ambitious characters are ready to muscle their way into your campaign.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|67/The Everwinking Eye: Who's Who in Mulmaster, Part 2}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 68|Polyhedron #68]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Goodbye, Mulmaster
| style="text-align: center;" |Our sage bids goodbye to [[Mulmaster]] - but not before he presents a few dangerous plot twists.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|68/The Everwinking Eye: Goodbye, Mulmaster}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 70|Polyhedron #70]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster's Eversmoking Pipe Revealed
| style="text-align: center;" |The secrets of [[Elminster]]'s pipe are revealed...well, some of them anyway.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|70/The Everwinking Eye: Elminster's Eversmoking Pipe Revealed}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 71|Polyhedron #71]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster's Eversmoking Pipe Revealed
| style="text-align: center;" |Three avatars are waiting to trouble the adventurers in your campaign. [[Beshaba]], [[Tymora]], and [[Xvim]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|71/The Everwinking Eye: Beshaba, Tymora, and Xvim}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 72|Polyhedron #72]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Tears of the Dragon
| style="text-align: center;" |The Realms creator explains why a certain dragon's tears are precious and re-introduces adventurers to the mysteries of [[The Vast]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|72/The Everwinking Eye: The Tears of the Dragon}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 74|Polyhedron #74]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Words To The Wise
| style="text-align: center;" |This overview of [[Faerûn]]ian terms and names will have you speaking [[Common]] like a native in no time.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|74/The Everwinking Eye: Words To The Wise}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 75|Polyhedron #75]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Sagely Secrets Made Known
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Elminster]] takes time out to find printing mistakes in products relating to the Realms campaign setting, including additional ''[[Spellfire]]'' rules.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|75/The Everwinking Eye: Sagely Secrets Made Known}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 77|Polyhedron #77]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Moonsea Shores
| style="text-align: center;" |Dress warmly and keep your weapons handy as we embark on a tour of the chilly [[Moonsea]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|77/The Everwinking Eye: Moonsea Shores}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 78|Polyhedron #78]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Visit to Melvaunt
| style="text-align: center;" |A tour of [[Thentia]] and [[Melvaunt]], two [[Moonsea]] cities with a lot in common.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|78/The Everwinking Eye: A Visit to Melvaunt}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 79|Polyhedron #79]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Inside Thentia
| style="text-align: center;" |Stroll into [[Thentia]] and take a look at the city's politics.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|79/The Everwinking Eye: Inside Thentia}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 80|Polyhedron #80]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Temples, Cults, and Idle Gossip in Thentia
| style="text-align: center;" |Discover the details of [[Selûne]] worship in [[Thentia]] and what things lurk in the wilds of the [[Moonsea|Moonsea North]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|80/The Everwinking Eye: Temples, Cults, and Idle Gossip in Thentia}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 81|Polyhedron #81]]
| style="text-align: center;" |As Cold As Bare Fingers
| style="text-align: center;" |The frigid winds of the North whip across [[Glister]] and its environs, while the denizens of the cold lands plot to defeat caravans and adventurers. More than the climate is bitter in this place!
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|81/The Everwinking Eye: As Cold As Bare Fingers}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 82|Polyhedron #82]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Secrets of Zhentil Keep Revealed
| style="text-align: center;" |Stroll with us into [[Zhentil Keep]] - if you've the courage.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|82/The Everwinking Eye: Secrets of Zhentil Keep Revealed}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 83|Polyhedron #83]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Something Is Rotten At The Citadel Of The Raven
| style="text-align: center;" |The treacherous and cunning [[Zhentarim]] and the [[Citadel of the Raven]] are explored for your gaming pleasure.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|83/The Everwinking Eye: Something Is Rotten At The Citadel Of The Raven}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 84|Polyhedron #84]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Schemes of the Zhentarim
| style="text-align: center;" |The evil schemes of the [[Zhentarim]] find their way into neighboring lands. Learn about the wars and plans of [[Zhentil Keep]]'s devious residents.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|84/The Everwinking Eye: The Schemes of the Zhentarim}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 85|Polyhedron #85]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Pride of the North
| style="text-align: center;" |Life on the streets in [[Zhentil Keep]] is more placid than you might think.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|85/The Everwinking Eye: The Pride of the North}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 86|Polyhedron #86]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Adventures in Zhentil Keep
| style="text-align: center;" |It's time to bid [[Zhentil Keep]] goodbye, but there's still time for an adventure or three. Four mini-adventures for Advanced Dungeons & Dragons.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|86/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Zhentil Keep}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 87|Polyhedron #87]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Sevenecho, Then and Now
| style="text-align: center;" |A look at the life and loves of [[Beliot Sevenecho|Beliost Sevenecho]] and at life in the [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|hamlet]] that bears his name.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|87/The Everwinking Eye: Sevenecho, Then and Now}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 88|Polyhedron #88]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Treasures of the Vast, Part One
| style="text-align: center;" |The treasures of [[The Vast]] unfold before you - are at least hints about them do.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|88/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part One}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 89|Polyhedron #89]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Treasures of the Vast, Part Two
| style="text-align: center;" |There's treasure in [[The Vast]] - if your characters have the mettle to capture it.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|89/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part Two}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 91|Polyhedron #91]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Treasures of the Vast, Part Three
| style="text-align: center;" |The treasure-tour of [[The Vast]] surveys six more locations for adventurers to make their fortunes...or lose their lives.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|91/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part Three}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 92|Polyhedron #92]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Treasures of the Vast, Part Four
| style="text-align: center;" |The penultimate installment of [[Elminster]]'s treasure-tour of the [[Vast]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|92/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part Four}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 93|Polyhedron #93]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Treasures of the Vast, Part Five
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Elminster]]'s treasure-tour of the vast concludes with a wink and a warning.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|93/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part Five}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 94|Polyhedron #94]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Land of Merchants
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Elminster]] has something other than a wink for [[Sembia]], land of merchants and schemers.e vast concludes with a wink and a warning.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|94/The Everwinking Eye: Land of Merchants}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 95|Polyhedron #95]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Clandestine Company
| style="text-align: center;" |Hsst! Can you keep a secret? News of secret societies and power groups in the Forgotten Realms.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|95/The Everwinking Eye: Clandestine Company}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 96|Polyhedron #96]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Mysterious Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |With a gift of roasted snails, the old sage shows that the mysterious land of [[Turmish]] isn't so mysterious after all.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|96/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Mysterious Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 98|Polyhedron #98]]
| style="text-align: center;" |More Hidden Powers of Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |Adventure and intrigue abound in [[Turmish]]. Get swept up in the action! 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|98/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: More Hidden Powers of Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 101|Polyhedron #101]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Turmish Customers and Festivals
| style="text-align: center;" |A fond look at [[Turmish]], as the sage muses over a few more reasons why it's more than just a great place to visit. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|101/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Turmish Customers and Festivals}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 103|Polyhedron #103]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Treasure Tour of Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |Descriptions of known, lost, suspected and well-guarded treasure troves in [[Turmish]]. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|103/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Treasure Tour of Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 104|Polyhedron #104]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Country Treasures
| style="text-align: center;" |More of the fabled treasures of [[Turmish]]!
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|104/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Country Treasures}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 105|Polyhedron #105]]
| style="text-align: center;" |More Fabled Treasures of the Land of Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |From [[Illowood]] to [[Lanthalal]], our treasure tour of [[Turmish]] continues!
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|105/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: More Fabled Treasures of the Land of Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 106|Polyhedron #106]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Endless Treasures in Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |The treasures of [[Turmish]] grow ever greater... and ever more dangerous.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|106/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Endless Treasures in Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 107|Polyhedron #107]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Well-Hidden Treasures
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Turmish|Turmishan]] treasures are everywhere... but finding them is the trick.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|107/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Well-Hidden Treasures}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 108|Polyhedron #108]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The End of the Road in Turmish
| style="text-align: center;" |The end of the road in [[Turmish]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|108/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The End of the Road in Turmish}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 109|Polyhedron #109]]
| style="text-align: center;" |First Look At The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |We begin our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|109/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: First Look At The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 110|Polyhedron #110]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Our Tour of the Border Kingdom Continues
| style="text-align: center;" |The sage continues his review of the [[Border Kingdoms]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|110/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Our Tour of the Border Kingdom Continues}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 111|Polyhedron #111]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Black Saddle, Great Oak, and Bedorn, and then a break
| style="text-align: center;" |The sage continues his review of the [[Border Kingdoms]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|111/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Black Saddle, Great Oak, and Bedorn, and then a break}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 115|Polyhedron #115]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Sage of Shadowdale returns!
| style="text-align: center;" |He's back! The Sage continues his descriptions of the [[Border Kingdoms]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|115/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Sage of Shadowdale returns!}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 116|Polyhedron #116]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms: Blackbarn and Bloutar
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Blackbarn]] and [[Bloutar]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|116/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Blackbarn and Bloutar}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 117|Polyhedron #117]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Dapplegate and Derlusk
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Dapplegate]] and [[Derlusk]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|117/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Dapplegate and Derlusk}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 118|Polyhedron #118]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Dunbridges and the Duskwood
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Dunbridges]] and the [[Duskwood]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|118/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Dunbridges and the Duskwood}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 119|Polyhedron #119]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Throat of Talduth Vale
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Emrys (town)|Emrys]], bottleneck of the [[Border Kingdoms]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|119/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Throat of Talduth Vale}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 120|Polyhedron #120]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms: Felshroun
| style="text-align: center;" |The independent town of [[Felshroun]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|120/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Felshroun}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 121|Polyhedron #121]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms: Felshroun's Four Mages
| style="text-align: center;" |A look at the "Unseen Friends" of [[Felshroun]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|121/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Felshroun's Four Mages}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 122|Polyhedron #122]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Gallard
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Elminster]] continues his tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] of [[Faerûn]] with [[Gallard]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|122/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Gallard}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 123|Polyhedron #123]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |A visit into the heart of waiting splendor and danger, The Grand Duchy of [[Shantal]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|123/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 124|Polyhedron #124]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms: Hawkgarth
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Hawkgarth]]: a pretty friendly place for such high undead content.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|124/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Hawkgarth}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 125|Polyhedron #125]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms: High Emmerock
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] continues fair apace with a look at one of [[Elminster]]'s favorite backwaters, [[High Emmerock]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|125/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: High Emmerock}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 126|Polyhedron #126]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |Who's who in [[High Emmerock]] and the dreaded [[Water Witch]] in [[Faerûn]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|126/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 127|Polyhedron #127]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |Come to [[High Mukshar]] - please! A continuing tour of the Forgotten Realms visits a forgotten backwater that's not dull... or safe.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|127/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 128|Polyhedron #128]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |A look at the quiet village of [[Irl]] in the Forgotten Realms.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|128/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 129|Polyhedron #129]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |An exploration of the Forgotten Realms jungle of [[Jundarwood]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|129/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 130|Polyhedron #130]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |An exploration of the Forgotten Realms Land of Two Princes.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|130/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 131|Polyhedron #131]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |The conclusion of our visit to the Land of Two Princes in [[Faerûn]]. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|131/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 132|Polyhedron #132]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our [[Volothamp Geddarm|Volo]] and [[Elminster]] guided tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] continues with a visit to [[Luthbaern]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|132/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 133|Polyhedron #133]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Border Kingdoms
| style="text-align: center;" |A visit to the old town of [[Manywaters]], which lies east of the [[River Rith]] and just southwest of the Grand Duchy of [[Shantal]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|133/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 134|Polyhedron #134]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] examines [[Middle Mukshar]], a land infamous in ballads as the Land of Slaughtered Knights.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|134/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 135|Polyhedron #135]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |The tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] continues with [[Myrinjar]], the capital of [[Adaerglast]], the Land of Mages.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|135/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 136|Polyhedron #136]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] this month looks at the [[Neth Stand]], a dark and deadly forest that fills the northwestern corner of the region in [[Faerûn]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|136/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 137|Polyhedron #137]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] this month looks at [[Nether Mukshar]], the last of the three Mukshar realms, a land often forgotten as a 'backlands' realm. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|137/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 138|Polyhedron #138]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our ongoing tour now introduces [[Oeble]], a town that stands nigh the center of the [[Border Kingdoms]], near many realms but a part of none...
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|138/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 139|Polyhedron #139]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |This month's instalment of our tour of the [[Border Kingdoms]] completes our look at the perilous but fascinating town of [[Oeble]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|139/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 140|Polyhedron #140]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our ongoing look at the bucolic and sometimes surprising glories of the [[Border Kingdoms]] brings us this month to the coastal realm of [[Ondeeme]], the "Echo of Calimshan."
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|140/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 141|Polyhedron #141]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our look at the sorcerous land of [[Ondeeme]] continues this month with descriptions of the rest of the [[Slee]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|141/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 143|Polyhedron #143]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our survey of [[Ondeeme]] concludes with a quick overview of recent history. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|143/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 144|Polyhedron #144]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour of the Forgotten Realms this month comes to [[Oparl]], capital of [[Bedorn]]. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|144/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 145|Polyhedron #145]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Our tour this month takes a last look around the curious town of [[Oparl]], luxurious (some would say decadent) capital of [[Bedorn]]. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|145/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 146|Polyhedron #146]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Enter the [[Owlhold]], where twisting forests hide deadly secrets and even deadlier adversaries. There'll be no maps to guide you, so heed well the words of the [[Elminster|Sage of Shadowdale]]. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|146/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 147|Polyhedron #147]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |Last issue we introduced the [[Owlhold]], a [[Border Kingdoms|Border Kingdom]] rife with those who would prefer to stay hidden. The wily Sage of Shadowdale continues his tour, with one eye on the best taverns in the region and another on his purse. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|147/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 148|Polyhedron #148]]
| style="text-align: center;" |A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms
| style="text-align: center;" |A catalogue of [[Owlhold]]'s brothels confirms your worst fears about the randy old Sage of Shadowdale's travelling habits. 
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|148/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms}}
|-
|}
